cv.name: Fabien Masson
cv.about: As a Full Stack Engineer, I have successfully taken multiple products from 0 to 1. I lead teams effectively, ensuring an environment where people can do their best work. Currently, I work mostly with TypeScript, React, Node.js, and GraphQL. I have over 8 years of experience in working remotely with companies all around the world.
